item.description:
Join us at Boston's LARGEST Salsa Event....
The 6th Annual Boston Salsa Congress taking place * March 26-29, 2010*

BUY YOUR DISCOUNTED PASS BEFORE IT'S TOO LATE
Visit Website
http://www.eventbrite...

This will be a weekend conference with workshops (YES FOR BEGINNERS AS WELL!!!), shows, live concerts, and dancing! If you've been wanting to get into salsa, this is the time to do it. This is the only full weekend salsa bootcamp immersion taking place in Boston for dancers of all levels this year!

We'll provide more info on meetup times closer to the date.

DON'T MISS THE EARLY BIRD FEE OF $199 FOR THE ENTIRE WEEKEND.
EARLY BIRD FEE ENDS FEBRUARY 12TH!

Team Boston 2010 invites you to the 6th Annual Boston Salsa Congress, March 25-28, 2010. The venue for the Congress is the beautiful and convenient Boston Marriott Cambridge Hotel.

The Boston Salsa Congress is Boston's Premier Salsa Dance event. Team Boston 2010 is working hard to deliver yet another weekend of non-stop Salsa fun, guaranteed to satisfy your eyes, ears, heart, body and soul!

Here's what the Congress has in store for you:

** 3 nights of thrilling salsa dance shows, followed by social dancing with LIVE MUSIC and DJ's till 3:30am!

**2 full days of workshops in salsa and other latin dance styles by local, national and international instructors (most of whom are world renowned artists).

**Our Saturday early evening Youth Showcase promises to rock the house, as usual!

We hope you will join us!

Stay tuned for more info!

BUY YOUR PASS NOW AND $AVE!

Buy Your Full Pass Now Online and $AVE. Now until February 12, 2010 the full congress pass can be purchased at $199. After January 1st, the price will increase to $240.

Receive a FREE Boston Salsa Congress T-Shirt if you purchase your Full Congress Pass by Jan. 1, 2010.
BOOK YOUR ROOM NOW!

The Boston Salsa Congress special discounted room rate is $167 plus tax.

Book your room early before our room block sells out!

Reserve your room by March 5, 2010 to receive the discounted rate.

Mention that you are with the Boston Salsa Congress to receive discounted parking.

Book NOW!

http://www.eventbrite...

group.name: The Boston & Cambridge Salsa Meetup Group

item.name: The 6th Annual Boston Salsa Congress
